instructions.1: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Prepare cake batter as directed on package for the light or low-fat version; set aside. Mix cream cheese, egg and sugar until well blended.
instructions.2: Remove 3/4 cup of the cherry pie filling for garnish; set aside. Spoon 2 tablespoons cake batter into each of 24 paper-lined medium muffin cups. Top each with 1 tablespoon each of the cream cheese mixture and the remaining cherry pie filling. Cover evenly with remaining cake batter.
instructions.3: Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until toothpick inserted in centres comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes; remove from pan to wire racks. Cool completely. Top with whipped topping and reserved cherry pie filling just before serving.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the cream cheese from Step 1 being used?
Is cream cheese from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is egg from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
Is cream cheese live after Step 1?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we remove (Step 2) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
